From Reiterâ€™s Camera Phone Report: Simon Woodside releases semacode URL software for Symbian camera phones:

QUOTE

Computer programmer Simon Woodside has released version 1.0 of his semacode software for Symbian/Series 60 camera phones that, in essence, incorporates a URL within a barcode. You snap a photo of the semacode graphic (left), the URL is displayed and you can click on it to access a Web page without having to laboriously enter the URL on a keypad. Simon has a Weblog that explains in detail the use and creation of semacodes.

UNQUOTE
